Title: textile
Description: Tira fragment woven in undyed linen; decorated with a frieze of stylised animal motifs (hare and birds?) in medallions created by stylised vegetal interlacing, in undyed, red, yellow and brown silk. Warp: silk, undyed, S, 28/cm Weft: silk, undyed, S, 16/cm Weft: silk, undyed, red, yellow and brown, I, 44/cm
